title: A Gangsta's Pledge
description: When life changes unexpectedly, the only thing you can do is change with it. NyAsia Miller learned this lesson the hard way when her parents died, leaving her to fend for herself at a young age.  Kwame “Saint” Harris is a natural born hustler. A certified gangsta that lives by the street code. As a young boss, he has it all. The money, women, cars and problems that come with being at the top of the drug game in New Orleans.  NyAsia and Saint reunite after years apart. The two instantly get swept up in a passionate romance. But they quickly realize that the past has a way of catching up to you…
author: E.L. Griffin
